title: Post-Condition Questionnaire
instructions: Please rate your experience with the condition that you have just completed.

questions.instructions: Please provide a rating on the previous set of tasks:
Did you encounter any errors in the system (not caused by you) while completing the tasks?

questions.placeholder: Please list the errors you encountered.
questions.instructions: If you answered 'Yes' to the question above, please specify the type of errors that occurred:
If you answered 'Yes' to the question above, how often did the errors occur (%)?
How easy was it for you to learn the items in this set of tasks?
How well did you memorize the items by the end of the previous set of tasks?
Was there anything in the previous set of tasks that hindered your learning of the items?

questions.placeholder: Please list the hindrances you encountered.
questions.instructions: If you answered 'Yes' to the question above, please specify the hindrances that occurred:
Did the items that you memorized in a previous condition interfere with learning this set of items?

Are there any additional comments or suggestions that you would like to share?
Did any part of the study take a long time to load?
